titles.title: A bill to establish a Congressional Award for Federal Paperwork Reduction.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 10/20/1988--Introduced. Establishes the Congressional Award for Federal Paperwork Reduction for eligible Federal employees who have made the most significant contribution to the reduction of the paperwork burden imposed on individuals, small businesses, State and local governments, and other persons by the Federal Government. Establishes the Congressional Award for Federal Paperwork Reduction Fund for the disbursement of cash awards and other costs of administering this Act. Declares the proceeds of any award to be nontaxable. Authorizes appropriations.
